title: Active and passive voice
objective: To learn conversion of sentence from Passive voice to Active voice and vice versa.
learningOutcome1: Student will able to learn about the conversion of sentence from passive voice to active voice.
learningOutcome2: Student will able to learn about the conversion of sentence from active voice to passive voice.
act1: In this activity, we are going to learn about the conversion of sentence from passive voice to active voice and vice versa.
act2: Understand the structure of the active voice and passive voice sentences.
act3: Convert the sentence from active voice to passive voice.
act4: Convert the sentence from passive voice to active voice.
act5: Click on "CHECK" to verify the converted sentence.
act6: The pop-up will show the result along with the explanation.
instr1: Convert Active Voice to Passive Voice.
instr2: Select the desired tense from the dropdown.
instr3: The sentence displayed is in Active voice.
instr4: Corresponding passive voice sentence is given in the form of disarranged words below.
instr5: Now, rearrange the given words below to construct the corresponding Passive voice of the given sentence.
instr7: Click on "CHECK" to check whether the Passive voice is properly constructed.
instr8: Click on "NEXT" to view the next sentence.
instr9: Click on level dropdown to attempt 'Level 1' or 'Level 2'.
instr10: Convert Passive Voice to Active Voice.
instr11: Select the desired tense from the dropdown.
instr12: The sentence displayed is in Passive voice.
instr13: Corresponding a active voice sentence is given in the form of disarranged words below.
instr14: Now, rearrange the given words below to construct the corresponding Active voice of the given sentence.
instr16: Click on "Check" to check whether the Active voice is properly constructed.
instr17: Click on "Next" to view the next sentence.
instr18: Click on 'Select Level' to attempt 'Level 1' or 'Level 2'.
q_instr2: The quiz will start after clicking on the "OK" button, along with a timer.
q_instr3: To select an option as an answer to a given question, click on it.
q_instr4: You will get two attempts to select the correct option to the question.
q_instr5: You may skip the question if you want.
q_instr6: The score and timing are displayed on the top of the screen throughout the quiz.
q_instr7: You will get +1 for each correct answer. There is no negative marking.
q_instr8: The scorecard will be generated at the end of the quiz.
wawgtl: What are we going to learn?
aysywtq: Are you sure you want to quit?
